title: Input
description: Configure what to extract from Facebook posts.

mode.title: Mode
mode.description: What to extract: full post details or only the post's date/time.

urls.title: Post URLs
urls.description: Array of Facebook post URLs to open (one per line).

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: JSON array, JSON {cookies:[...]}, or a raw Cookie header string.

enableOcr.title: Enable OCR fallback
enableOcr.description: Use Tesseract if DOM parsing fails (slower).

min_wait_ms.title: Min wait (ms)
min_wait_ms.description: Lower bound of randomized delay between actions.

max_wait_ms.title: Max wait (ms)
max_wait_ms.description: Upper bound of randomized delay between actions.

headless.title: Headless
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (no visible window).

timezoneId.title: Timezone
timezoneId.description: IANA timezone for Playwright context (e.g., Asia/Manila).
